title: Crime Alert 07.01.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.01.21
description:
44 years after woman found shot in the back, her husband is arrested for murder. Thieves steal 42,000 pounds of pistachios.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
